Title: All In
Writer: Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Patrick Harbinson, Chip Johannessen, Anya Leta (staff writer)
Actors: Claire Danes, Elizabeth Marvel, Maury Sterling, Linus Roache
Plot: Saul's mission is a go. The clock ticks on the Keane administration.
